mdRecord.dcterms:title: 1985 Season
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for the 1985 Barter Theatre season. Productions include: Nightingale Sang by C.P. Taylor, June 5- 23 | Billy Bishop Goes to War by John Gray and Eric Peterson, June 12- July 7 | Agnes of God by John Pielmeier, June 26- July 14 | Sea Marks by Gardner McKay, July 10- Aug 4 | My Fat Friend by Charles Laurence, July 17- Aug 4 | Belle of Amherst by William Luce, Aug 6-11 | Painting Churches by Tina Howe, Aug 7-25 | Educating Rita by Willy Russell, Aug 14- Sep 8 | Guardsman by Ferenc Molar, Aug 28- Sep 15 | Greater Tuna by Jaston Williams, Joe Sears, Ed Howard, Sep 18- Oct 6 | Twice Around the Park by Murray Schisgal, Oct 9- 27. Youth Theatre programs: Merry Adventures of Robin Hood, June 19- July 13 | Fairy Tales and Fables, July 24- Aug 17.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The original object is the property of the Barter Theatre in Abingdon, VA (https://www.bartertheatre.com/). This digital surrogate is made publicly available by the Barter Theatre for use in research, teaching, private study, and other educational purposes. Responsibility for any use of these materials rests exclusively with the user. When using this item, users should give proper credit to the owner of the original object as well as to Virginia Tech Libraries.
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
